verses.verse: Hear <WH238> us, <WH7462> Shepherd of Israel, <WH3478> you who lead <WH5090> Joseph <WH3130> like a flock, <WH6629> you who sit <WH3427> above the cherubim, <WH3742> shine forth. <WH3313>
Before <WH6440> Ephraim <WH669> and Benjamin <WH1144> and Manasseh, <WH4519> stir up <WH5782> your might! <WH1369> Come <WH3212> to save us! <WH3444>
Turn us again, <WH7725> God. <WH430> Cause your face <WH6440> to shine, <WH215> and we will be saved. <WH3467>
Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> of Armies, <WH6635> How long will you be angry <WH6225> against the prayer <WH8605> of your people? <WH5971>
You have fed <WH398> them with the bread <WH3899> of tears, <WH1832> and given them tears <WH1832> to drink <WH8248> in large measure. <WH7991>
You make <WH7760> us a source of contention <WH4066> to our neighbors. <WH7934> Our enemies <WH341> laugh among themselves. <WH3932>
Turn us again, <WH7725> God <WH430> of Armies. <WH6635> Cause your face <WH6440> to shine, <WH215> and we will be saved. <WH3467>
You brought <WH5265> a vine <WH1612> out of Egypt. <WH4714> You drove out <WH1644> the nations, <WH1471> and planted it. <WH5193>
You cleared <WH6437> the ground <WH6440> for it. <WH8328> It took deep root, <WH8327> and filled <WH4390> the land. <WH776>
The mountains <WH2022> were covered <WH3680> with its shadow. <WH6738> Its boughs <WH6057> were like God <WH410>'s cedars. <WH730>
It sent out <WH7971> its branches <WH3127> to the sea, <WH3220> Its shoots <WH3127> to the River. <WH5104>
Why have you broken down <WH6555> its walls, <WH1447> so that all those who pass <WH5674> by the way <WH1870> pluck it? <WH717>
The boar <WH2386> out of the wood <WH3293> ravages <WH3765> it. <WH2123> The wild animals of the field <WH7704> feed on it. <WH7462>
Turn <WH7725> again, <WH430> we beg you, God of Armies. <WH6635> Look down <WH5027> from heaven, <WH8064> and see, <WH7200> and visit <WH6485> this vine, <WH1612>
the stock <WH3657> which your right hand <WH3225> planted, <WH5193> the branch <WH1121> that you made strong for yourself. <WH553>
It <WH8313>'s burned with fire. <WH784> It <WH3683>'s cut down. They perish <WH6> at your <WH6440> rebuke. <WH1606>
Let your hand <WH3027> be on the man <WH376> of your right hand, <WH3225> on the son <WH1121> of man <WH120> whom you made strong for yourself. <WH553>
So we will not turn away <WH5472> from you. <WH2421> Revive us, <WH7121> and we will call on your name. <WH8034>
Turn us again, <WH7725> Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> of Armies. <WH6635> Cause your face <WH6440> to shine, <WH215> and we will be saved. <WH3467>
